name: Beavis And Butt-Head In Quest To Score
summary: Beavis and Butt-head can't afford tickets to a concert that they want to go to as the tickets are 20bucks and unfortunately they only had 20 cents. With a goal in mind to score and to do things that don't suck Beavis and Butt-Head set off to get $20 to pay for the tickets and to acquire the delicacy known as Nachos as the venue didn't sell it.
